description: Returns the estimated number of activity tasks in the specified task list. The count returned is an approximation and isn't guaranteed to be exact. If you specify a task list that no activity task was ever scheduled in then 0 is returned. You can use IAM policies to control this action's access to Amazon SWF resources as follows: If the caller doesn't have sufficient permissions to invoke the action, or the parameter values fall outside the specified constraints, the action fails. The associated event attribute's cause parameter is set to OPERATION_NOT_PERMITTED. For details and example IAM policies, see Using IAM to Manage Access to Amazon SWF Workflows in the Amazon SWF Developer Guide.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain that contains the task list.

parameters.name: taskList
parameters.description: The name of the task list. The name of the task list.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the task list.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The number of tasks in the task list.

nested_items.name: truncated
nested_items.description: If set to true, indicates that the actual count was more than the maximum supported by this API and the count returned is the truncated value.
